00097 Normal::Normal( double mean, double variance )
00098   : pMean  ( mean ),
00099     pStdDev( sqrt( variance ) ),
00100     iset   ( false ),
00101     gset   ( 0 ) // to avoid uninitialized memory read warnings
00102 {
00103 }

00106 //========================================================================
00140 Normal::Normal( double mean, double variance, RNG& r )
00141   : RandomVar< double >( r ),
00142     pMean  ( mean ),
00143     pStdDev( sqrt( variance ) ),
00144     iset   ( false ),
00145     gset   ( 0 ) // to avoid uninitialized memory read warnings
00146 {
00147 }

00152 //========================================================================
00180 double Normal::operator( )( )
00181 {
00182 //
00183 //      We actually generate two IID normal distribution variables.
00184 //      We cache the one & return the other.
00185 // 
00186 
00187     double fac, rsq, v, w;
00188 
00189     if( ! iset ) {
00190         do {
00191             v   = 2 * rng( ) - 1;
00192             w   = 2 * rng( ) - 1;
00193             rsq = v*v + w*w;
00194         } while( rsq >= 1 || rsq == 0 );
00195 
00196         fac  = sqrt( -2 * log( rsq ) / rsq );
00197         gset = v * fac;
00198         iset = true;
00199 
00200         return pMean + w * fac * pStdDev;
00201     } else {
00202         iset = false;
00203         return pMean + gset * pStdDev;
00204     }
00205 }
00206 
00207 
00208 //========================================================================
00231 double Normal::operator( )( double mean, double variance )
00232 {
00233     return operator( )( ) * ( sqrt( variance ) / pStdDev )
00234       + ( mean - pMean );
00235 }
00236 
00237 
00238 //========================================================================
00258 double Normal::p( const double& x ) const
00259 {
00260     double y = ( x - pMean ) / pStdDev;
00261 
00262     return exp( -y*y / 2 ) / ( znSqrtPi2C * pStdDev );
00263 }
